item.title: At Least Two Xbox Exclusives Coming To Nintendo Switch 2, It’s Claimed
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/at-least-two-xbox-exclusives-coming-to-nintendo-switch-2-its-claimed/

The Nintendo Switch 2 could be getting a major boost in games after it launches. According to a new claim from known leaker NateTheHate, Xbox exclusives Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 and Halo: The Master Chief Collection are coming to the Nintendo Switch 2.

The games are also reported to be coming to PlayStation 5 as well.

“Games that I have heard will be released multiplatform in 2025, beyond the obvious, include Flight Simulator—will come to PlayStation 5 and Switch 2—and Halo: The Master Chief Collection will be coming to PS5 and Switch 2 as well,” NateTheHate said.

While those two games were the main ones discussed, they don’t appear to be the only ones coming to the upcoming Nintendo console. In a reply to a post on social media about games coming to the system, Windows Central Executive Editor Jez Corden said the total would be “way more than that”. He then followed up with that the games would be “most older games/timed stuff”.

RELATED: Xbox Developer Direct Announced for January 23 

No other details about what older games could come to the system were mentioned. Aside from Xbox games, NateTheHate also suggested that Final Fantasy 7 Remake and Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth—both PlayStation 5 console exclusives—will come to the system. They’ll also be coming to Xbox starting with Remake in 2025 and Rebirth in 2026.

What do you think of the Nintendo Switch 2 getting major Xbox first-party games like Flight Simulator and Halo? Let us know down below, and join more discussions in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the latest developments at Ubisoft and a possible sale and our official preview of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2. And don’t forget to sign up for our newsletter.

item.title: Score Big With Zenless Zone Zero Codes for January 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/score-big-with-zenless-zone-zero-codes-for-january-2025/

As a free-to-play gacha game, you can expect all manner of rewards, monthly gifts, the occasional free item via the mailbox system, and a handful of active codes for Zenless Zone Zero at any given time. They want you to keep playing and grinding away, which means occasionally rewarding you with items and currency. Well, you’re in luck because there are tons of active codes for January 2025!

All Active Zenless Zone Zero Codes (January 2025)

Here are all of the available codes for Zenless Zone Zero. There are a few here that require you to progress through the game, reaching level five or higher, before you can activate them, so consider playing the game a bit before delving into the rewards circuit!

  • ASTRANOMICAL — 300 Polychromes, 30k Dennies, 2 Senior Investigator Log, and 3 W-Engine Module
  • ZZZFM — 3 Senior Investigator Log, 3 W-Engine Module, 3 Ether Planting Agent, Ether Battery, and 40k Dennies
  • ZZZASSEMBLE — 50 Polychromes
  • MIYABIRELEASE — 60 Polychromes
  • HARUMASAFREE — 50 Polychromes
  • VOIDHUNTER — 300 Polychromes, 30k Dennies, 2 Senior Investigator Logs, and 3 W-Engine Modules
  • VIRTUALREVENGE — 300 Polychromes, 30k Dennies, 2 Senior Investigator Logs, and 3 W-Engine Modules
  • HSAHLWFEFE — 60 Polychromes and 6,666 Dennies
  • TOURDEINFERNO — 300 Polychromes, 30k Dennies, 2 Senior Investigator Logs, and 3 W-Engine Modules
  • BANDP43VWC7H — 60 Polychromes and 6,666 Dennies
  • UNDERCOVERRNB — 300 Polychromes
  • USNC9SB4499R — 6 W-Engine Power Supplies
  • XTNDQAS44985 — 4 Official Investigator Log
  • NB6D9SB4MPSZ — 6 Crystallized Plating Agent
  • NS6U9TTLM6AV — 2 Bangboo Algorithm Modules
  • 4BPDRBT459RH — 6,000 Dennies
  • KANURBT5MQ8D — 40 Polychromes
  • CATCHABOO — 30 Polychromes
  • ZZZTVCM — 50 Polychromes and 6,000 Dennies
  • ZZZ2024 — 50 Polychromes and 6,000 Dennies
  • ZENLESSLAUNCH — 60 Polychromes and 6,666 Dennies
  • ZENLESSGIFT —50 Polychromes, 2 Official Investigator Logs, 3 W-Engine Power Supply, and 1 Bangboo Algorithm Module
  • ZZZFREE100 — 300 Polychromes, 2 Senior Investigator Log, 3 W-Engine Energy Module, and 30k Dennies

How to Activate Zenless Zone Zero Codes

Once you find a code you want to use (all of them!), then follow these steps:

  1. Open the in-game menu
  2. Select ‘More’
  3. Choose ‘Redemption Code’ and copy/paste or type in the code
  4. Choose ‘Redeem’
  5. Once activated, you’ll receive your rewards via the in-game mailbox

What do you think of Zenless Zone Zero? Is it still as enticing as day one? Let us know in the comments below, or visit the Insider Gaming forums to discuss this and other gacha games with like-minded players!

While these code rewards offer plenty of resources, you’ll still want to learn how to get Polychrome in Zenless Zone Zero for upgrades and items!
